title: Adam Frederick
description:
Kirk Minihane shit his pants this morning (00:00:01). Kirk says Dave is the ultimate snake after it comes to light that Justin was not the only name he gave to Tommy Quinlan of WPRO (00:57:31). Quinlan, Justin & Adam Federick all join to discuss the situation. Alec Baldwin is front and center of a horrific accident on set of his new movie 'Rust' (00:05:43). Details are emerging showing a movie set rife with production issues that culminated with the accidental shooting of the director of photography Halyna Hutchins & the movie's director. Former radio host and long time NBC Sports reporter Bob Neumeier passed away over the weekend from heart failure (00:24:00). Jen Royle goes on another tweetstorm after an incident with a customer (00:48:01). A Barstool Sports producer who hates Kirk claims he got robbed and smacked with a gun over the weekend & much more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
